content: Cocoon is a new object- and feature-level uncertainty-aware multimodal fusion framework designed for 3D OD tasks. See how we achieve uncertainty quantification and comparison for heterogeneous representations!
summary: Cocoon is a new object- and feature-level uncertainty-aware multimodal fusion framework designed for 3D OD tasks.
title: Cocoon Accepted to ICLR'25

content: I am a third-year Ph.D. student advised by Prof. Z. Morley Mao. My research interests include Efficient AI, Robust AI, Multi-Modal, Autonomous Driving, and Inference and Fine-Tuning Optimization.
title: Introduction

content: This survey paper on AV security and safety has been developed in collaboration with the AV reading group at UMich. Hope it will serve as vital ammunition for practitioners in the field.
summary: This survey paper on AV security and safety has been developed in collaboration with the AV reading group at UMich.
title: Our Paper Accepted to ACM CSCS'24

content: Will be working as a Deep Learning Software Intern at NVIDIA Metropolis team! See you in Santa Clara :D
summary: Will be working as a Deep Learning Software Intern at NVIDIA Metropolis team!
title: Start Internship at NVIDIA

content: ADoPT is a cutting-edge defense mechanism against LiDAR spoofing attacks, leveraging point-level temporal consistency.
summary: ADoPT is a cutting-edge defense mechanism against LiDAR spoofing attacks, leveraging point-level temporal consistency.
title: ADoPT Accepted to BMVC'23
